name: Take 3 Fight 3!
description:
A gamejam project I created in RPGMaker MZ.

Gameplay is focused around a retro dungeon-crawl, with lots of resource management and meaningful (I hope) choices to be made. Combat is low-numbers, Dragon-Quest type stuff but with a bit more "combat puzzle" especially towards the mid and end-game.

Intended to be played without saves (permadeath!) but you can turn on saves and hints in case the difficulty isn't suitable. After multiple playthroughs I think it isn't too broken and I am hoping people actually find exploits I never thought of :)

I had to cut a lot of corners versus the original spec but hey, it's the first real project I've ever released, so...

No scripts, but 3rd party graphics and music assets were used

Credits to: BitbyBitBert, YujiBoy, LuckyCasette, TheMightyPalm, SorceressGameLab, somepx
